question_es: ¿Qué porcentaje del monto total de préstamos concentran los 5 préstamos más grandes?
sql: SELECT SUM(loanAmount) * 100.0 / (SELECT SUM(loanAmount) FROM dbo.Loans) AS concentracion_pct FROM (SELECT TOP 5 loanAmount FROM dbo.Loans ORDER BY loanAmount DESC) AS top5

question_es: ¿Cuánto concentran las 3 sucursales con más empleados del total de empleados?
sql: SELECT SUM(emp_count) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dbo.Employees) AS concentracion_pct FROM (SELECT TOP 3 COUNT(*) AS emp_count FROM dbo.Employees GROUP BY branchId ORDER BY emp_count DESC) AS top3

question_es: ¿Qué tan concentrado está el volumen de transacciones en las 10 cuentas más activas?
sql: SELECT SUM(total_trans) * 100.0 / (SELECT SUM(amount) FROM dbo.Transactions) AS concentracion_pct FROM (SELECT TOP 10 SUM(amount) AS total_trans FROM dbo.Transactions GROUP BY accountId ORDER BY total_trans DESC) AS top10

question_es: ¿Cuánto representan los 5 clientes con mayor saldo del saldo total?
sql: SELECT SUM(saldo) * 100.0 / (SELECT SUM(currentBalance) FROM dbo.Accounts) AS concentracion_pct FROM (SELECT TOP 5 SUM(a.currentBalance) AS saldo FROM dbo.AccountOwnerships ao JOIN dbo.Accounts a ON ao.accountId = a.id GROUP BY ao.ownerId ORDER BY saldo DESC) AS top5

question_es: ¿Qué tan concentrados están los pagos en los 10 préstamos con más pagos?
sql: SELECT SUM(total_pagos) * 100.0 / (SELECT SUM(paymentAmount) FROM dbo.LoanPayments) AS concentracion_pct FROM (SELECT TOP 10 SUM(paymentAmount) AS total_pagos FROM dbo.LoanPayments GROUP BY loanId ORDER BY total_pagos DESC) AS top10

question_es: ¿Qué porcentaje de intereses concentran los 5 préstamos con tasa más alta?
sql: SELECT SUM(loanAmount * interestRate / 100) * 100.0 / (SELECT SUM(loanAmount * interestRate / 100) FROM dbo.Loans) AS concentracion_pct FROM (SELECT TOP 5 loanAmount, interestRate FROM dbo.Loans ORDER BY interestRate DESC) AS top5

question_es: ¿Cuánto concentran los 3 meses con más transacciones del volumen anual?
sql: SELECT SUM(monto_mes) * 100.0 / (SELECT SUM(amount) FROM dbo.Transactions) AS concentracion_pct FROM (SELECT TOP 3 SUM(amount) AS monto_mes FROM dbo.Transactions GROUP BY MONTH(transactionDate) ORDER BY monto_mes DESC) AS top3

question_es: ¿Qué tan concentrado está el monto de préstamos en los 3 tipos de préstamo principales?
sql: SELECT SUM(total) * 100.0 / (SELECT SUM(loanAmount) FROM dbo.Loans) AS concentracion_pct FROM (SELECT TOP 3 SUM(loanAmount) AS total FROM dbo.Loans GROUP BY loanType ORDER BY total DESC) AS top3

question_es: ¿Cuánto concentran las 3 horas pico en el volumen total de transacciones?

question_es: ¿Cuánto concentran los 3 clientes con más transacciones del total?
